Class ConditionalTrainer

java.lang.Object
  edu.jhu.coe.PCFGLA.ConditionalTrainer

public class ConditionalTrainer
extends Object

Reads in the Penn Treebank and generates N_GRAMMARS different grammars.

Author:
Slav Petrov

logLikelihood

public static double logLikelihood(List<Tree<StateSet>> trees,
                                   boolean verbose)
This function probably doesn't belong here, but because it should be called after updateStateSetTrees(java.util.List>, edu.jhu.coe.PCFGLA.ArrayParser), Leon left it here.

Parameters:
trees - Trees which have already had their inside-outside probabilities calculated, as by updateStateSetTrees(java.util.List>, edu.jhu.coe.PCFGLA.ArrayParser).
Returns:
The log likelihood of the trees.

updateStateSetTrees

public static void updateStateSetTrees(List<Tree<StateSet>> trees,
                                       ArrayParser parser)
This updates the inside-outside probabilities for the list of trees using the parser's doInsideScores and doOutsideScores methods.

Parameters:
trees - A list of binarized, annotated StateSet Trees.
parser - The parser to score the trees.
